overview:
Vani is a renowned entrepreneur and a visionary known for identifying emerging markets. For the past decade, she has carved a niche in building successful software companies. Vani has partnered with Vinod Dham to co-found NEA-IndoUS Ventures, an early-stage venture capital firm, focused on enabling
world-class entrepreneurship in India.

Vani was the founder and CEO of Certus Software, a leader in the Financial Compliance market. Prior to establishing Certus, Vani was the founder and CEO of RightWorks, a successful e-procurement company. Vani has also held management and engineering positions at Consilium and Control Data Corporation.

Vani’s commitment to excellence and integrity directs her approach to building companies, developing products and empowering people. Vani is profiled in numerous books and has been identified as one of the top 10 entrepreneurs in Silicon Valley.

She is also actively involved in various organizations focused on fostering entrepreneurship and women leadership.

Vani holds a Bachelor’s and Master’s Degree in electrical engineering.
